headline: Exciting Company. Toxic Culture.
pros: The company produced unique and innovative properties. The development and finance team produced a great product.
cons: It is a completely unhealthy environment in terms of company culture. From the top down, leadership is terrible. The CEO and many of the other managing directors have no interest in the growth of their employees. When things go wrong, leadership immediately points fingers and plays the blame game. And unfortunately, the property management department bear the brunt of most issues.

headline: A lot of room for growth
pros: Flexible schedule a lot of room for growth opportunities. Everyone on the team is great
cons: Non stop building issues out of PM control due to terrible construction

headline: Great Team of People
pros: Great coworkers, exciting projects, and good perks
cons: Opportunity for growth can be unclear

headline: Innovative Company Insufficient Leadership
pros: great working environment, forward thinking concepts
cons: Failure of Owners and Upper management to communicate with employees and assess their Directors leadership abilities

headline: Analyst
pros: Managing team is made of very experienced and knowledgeable professionals with experience in deal structuring and emerging markets.
cons: Exciting and exotic but few possibilities for promotion.Also Pay in on commission and company is under capitalized. Management is greedy and stingy.Very good idea even though big banks and funds are now internalizing these advisory services

headline: Review
cons: None, really considered. They are fine people

headline: shady company
pros: Casual, fun environment with a relaxed atmosphere you'd expect to find at a start-up. And the beer is free!
cons: There are no policies in place regarding ANYTHING. Also, anyone fresh out of college can be hired for a position that other people have worked years for at a more established company. If you're old though, you're a shoo-in.

headline: Very ethical and hardworking with extremely smart management
cons: Not for people that require a high degree of stucture.
